CustomField.formula: IMAGE('/img/samples/color_green.gif','*',9,9) + IF(Age__c >= 7,IMAGE('/img/samples/color_green.gif','*',9,9),'') + IF(Age__c >= 14,IMAGE('/img/samples/color_green.gif','*',9,9),'') + IF(Age__c >= 21,IMAGE('/img/samples/color_green.gif','*',9,9),'') + IF(Age__c >= 28,IMAGE('/img/samples/color_green.gif','*',9,9),'') + IF(Age__c >= 35,IMAGE('/img/samples/color_green.gif','*',9,9),'') + IF(Age__c >= 42,IMAGE('/img/samples/color_yellow.gif','*',9,9),'') + IF(Age__c >= 49,IMAGE('/img/samples/color_yellow.gif','*',9,9),'') + IF(Age__c >= 56,IMAGE('/img/samples/color_red.gif','*',9,9),'')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green: Less than 6 wks Yellow: 6 to 7 wks Red: Greater than 8 wks
CustomField.label: Age Indicator
